sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app
    //- div.header(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + jumpBar[0].src + ')'}")
    //- v-carousel
    //-     v-carousel-item(v-for="(item,i) in items" :key="i" :src="item.src" reverse-transition="fade-transition" transition="fade-transition")
    div.slideshow-container
        .mySlides.mySlides1.fade
            img(:src="jumpBar[0].src" style='width:100%;height: 720px')
        
        .mySlides.mySlides2.fade(v-for='(jumpImage,index) in jumpBar' v-if="index!=0 &&index!= jumpBar.length-1")
            img(:src="jumpImage.src" style='width:100%;height: 720px')
        .mySlides.mySlides3.fade
            img(:src="jumpBar[jumpBar.length-1].src" style='width:100%;height: 720px')
        .textBlock
            h1 {{jumpBar[slideIndex-1].title}}
            p {{jumpBar[slideIndex-1].subtitle}}
        div.prevBut(@click='plusSlides(-1)') <
        div.nextBut(@click='plusSlides(1)') >
        span.dot(v-for="(dot,index) in jumpBar" @click='currentSlide(index+1)')

    div.content
        div.contentBlock-1.contentBlock
            div
                div.imageBlock-1(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}") 
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-2(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[1].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類 
            div 
                div.imageBlock-3(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[2].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-4(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
        div.contentBlock-2.contentBlock
            div.blockTitle 最新消息 
                div.newsDer
            table
                tr(v-for='item in newList')
                    td.newsList
                        div.newsImage
                            img(:src='item.src')
                    td.newsTitle {{item.title}}
    div.content
        div.contentBlock-3.contentBlock
            div.onlyImageBlock(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + midArticle.src + ')'}")
                div.onlyImageMask 文章種類
        div.contentBlock-4.contentBlock
            div
                div.imageBlock-1(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}") 
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-2(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[1].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
            div    
                div.imageBlock-3(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[2].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
                div.imageBlock-4(:style="{'background-image': 'url(' + article[0].src + ')'}")
                    div.imageMask 文章種類
</template>

<script>
var slideIndex = 1;
export default {
//   el: "#app",
    data() {
        return {
            jumpBar: [
            {
                src: 'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1bGzE1WKQB8GaCK5SwNyM8bkWkihsh4cB',
                title: '1title',
                subtitle: '1subTitle'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/sky.jpg',
                title: 'hhahahah',
                subtitle: 'lalalalala'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/bird.jpg',
                title: 'title',
                subtitle: 'subtitle'
            },
            {
                src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/planet.jpg',
                title: 'title',
                subtitle: 'subtitle'
            },
            ],
            slideIndex: 1,
            newList: [
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=18oEw9LHOZ6xAYpOgOkAAS1aErsqxfQnj',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1aZCAvTGfMlegjuPWWYt-2H__43G_5C6X',title: '文化部鼓勵企業參與，第１４屆...'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1KvyU-9wizbgXLpVs6vTR0bi5qTJZZd3D',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1U1tibryBcLQkXoHOFJ0Gs31NdeSczDXV',title: '2019台積電文學獎徵選'}
            ],
            article: [
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1LSmUrWFmmNic38VQqSnSGiHmteQunLhJ',title:''},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1iqWr031nFEhn-EDbHuFdR4G_MngFZydc',title:''},
                {src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1njXHmK050y_qdLeodSRnfio6fwx8dToY',title:''}
            ],
            midArticle: {
                src:'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=1JVmSvd3KY2g73kITkHUf2dE-6A81e8hR',
                title: ''
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        plusSlides(n) {
            this.showSlides(slideIndex += n);
        },

        currentSlide(n){
            this.showSlides(slideIndex = n);
        },

        showSlides(n){
            var i;
            var slides = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides");
            var dots = document.getElementsByClassName("dot");
            var subWidth = 14/(slides.length-2);
            if (n > slides.length) {slideIndex = 1}    
            if (n < 1) {slideIndex = slides.length}
            var numSubBlock = 0;
            for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
                //slides[i].style.display = "none"; 
                if(i!=slideIndex-1){
                    if(slideIndex==slides.length){
                        if(i!=0){
                            slides[i].style= "-webkit-clip-path : polygon("+(86+subWidth*numSubBlock)+"% 0, "+(86+subWidth*(numSubBlock+1))+"% 0, "+(83+subWidth*(numSubBlock+1))+"% 100%, "+(83+subWidth*numSubBlock)+"% 100%)";  //else block 
                            numSubBlock ++;
                        }
                    }
                    else{
                        if(i!=slideIndex){
                            slides[i].style= "-webkit-clip-path : polygon("+(86+subWidth*numSubBlock)+"% 0, "+(86+subWidth*(numSubBlock+1))+"% 0, "+(83+subWidth*(numSubBlock+1))+"% 100%, "+(83+subWidth*numSubBlock)+"% 100%)";  //else block 
                            numSubBlock ++;
                        }
                    }
                    
                }
            }
            if(slideIndex==slides.length){
                slides[0].style= "-webkit-clip-path : polygon(70% 0, 86% 0, 83% 100%, 75% 100%)";  //second block when slideIndex come to the end 
            }
            else{
                slides[slideIndex].style= "-webkit-clip-path : polygon(70% 0, 86% 0, 83% 100%, 75% 100%)";  //second block
            }
            for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
                dots[i].className = dots[i].className.replace(" active", "");
            }
            slides[slideIndex-1].style = "-webkit-clip-path : polygon(0 0, 70% 0, 75% 100%, 0 100%)";  //first block
            dots[slideIndex-1].className += " active";
            this.slideIndex = slideIndex;
        }
    },

    created() {
        setInterval(() => this.plusSlides(1), 5000);
    }
}

</script>

<style lang="sass">
*
    transition: 0.6s

.header
    height: 640px
    background-size: contain

.content
    display: flex
    flex-flow: row wrap
    
.content > * 
    padding: 10px
    flex: 1 100%


    
@media all and (min-width: 0px)
    .onlyImageBlock
        // width: 100%
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: center
    .contentBlock-1,.contentBlock-4
        justify-content: center
        display: flex
        flex-flow: row wrap

@media all and (min-width: 640px)
    .contentBlock
        flex: 1 0 0
        justify-content: center
        
    .onlyImageBlock
        width: 585px
        height: 430px
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: flex-end
        background-size: contain
    .contentBlock-1 ,.contentBlock-3,.contentBlock-4
        padding: 0
        margin: 0
        list-style: none
        display: -webkit-box
        display: -moz-box
        display: -ms-flexbox
        display: -webkit-flex
        display: flex
        -webkit-flex-flow: row wrap
        align-content: center
        flex-flow: row wrap

@media all and (min-width: 1280px)
    .contentBlock-1
        order: 1
        justify-content: flex-end
        display: flex
        flex-flow: row wrap
        
    .contentBlock-2
        order: 2
        justify-content: flex-start
    .contentBlock-3
        order: 3
        justify-content: flex-end
    .contentBlock-4
        order: 4
        justify-content: flex-start
    .onlyImageBlock
        width: 580px
        height: 430px
        margin: 10px
        justify-content: flex-end
        background-size: contain

.imageBlock-1, .imageBlock-2 ,.imageBlock-3,.imageBlock-4
    // padding: 15px
    width: 280px
    height: 210px
    margin-top: 10px
    margin: 10px
    line-height: 210px
    color: white
    font-weight: bold
    font-size: 3em
    text-align: center
    background-size: contain

.blockTitle
    position: relative
    padding: 10px
    font-size: 28px
    text-align: left
    font-style: bold
    color: #302D2D
    background-fill-opacity: 0
    z-index: 1
.newsImage
    width: 60px
    height: 60px
    border: 1px #302D2D solid
    
.newsTitle
    font-size: 15px
    padding: 10px
    text-align: left
    color: #6F6F6F
    
.newsList
    padding: 15px
    text-align: left
    display: flex 
    width: 100px

.newsTitle:hover
    cursor: pointer

.newsDer
    position: absolute
    top: 28px
    height: 15px
    width: 120px
    background-color: #FFC53D
    border-radius: 50px
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow(7px 7px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3))
    filter: drop-shadow(7px 7px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3))
    opacity: 0.5
    z-index: -1

.imageMask
    position: relative
    top: 0px
    left: 0px
    height: 210px
    background-color: #000
    opacity: 0.5
    transition: 0.6s
    
.imageMask:hover
    opacity: 0
    cursor: pointer
.onlyImageMask
    position: relative
    top: 0px
    left: 0px
    height: 430px
    background-color: #000
    opacity: 0.5
    transition: 0.6s
    
.onlyImageMask:hover
    opacity: 0
    cursor: pointer



.slideshow-container
    max-width: 1280px
    position: relative
    margin: auto


.mySlides
    cursor: pointer
    

.mySlides:hover
    opacity: 0.5
    top: -5px
    right: 5px
    
.mySlides1
    -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0, 70% 0, 75% 100%, 0 100%)
    position: absolute
    

.mySlides2
    -webkit-clip-path: polygon(70% 0, 86% 0, 83% 100%, 75% 100%)
    position: absolute
    

.mySlides3
    -webkit-clip-path: polygon(86% 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 83% 100%)
/* Next & previous buttons

.prevBut
    cursor: pointer
    position: absolute
    top: 85%
    left: 0px
    width: auto
    padding: 10px
    margin-top: -22px
    color: white
    font-weight: bold
    font-size: 50px
    transition: 0.6s ease
    border-radius: 10px
    user-select: none
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))
    filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))

.nextBut
    cursor: pointer
    position: absolute
    top: 85%
    left: 70%
    width: auto
    padding: 10px
    margin-top: -22px
    color: white
    font-weight: bold
    font-size: 50px
    transition: 0.6s ease
    border-radius: 10px
    user-select: none
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))
    filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))


/* Position the "next button" to the right

/* On hover, add a black background color with a little bit see-through

.prevBut:hover, .nextBut:hover
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)

/* The dots/bullets/indicators

.dot
    cursor: pointer
    height: 15px
    width: 15px
    margin: 0 2px
    margin-top:10px
    background-color: #FFC53D
    border-radius: 50%
    display: inline-block
    transition: background-color 0.6s ease

.active, .dot:hover
    opacity: 0.5

/* Fading animation

.fade
    -webkit-animation-name: fade
    -webkit-animation-duration: 1.5s
    animation-name: fade
    animation-duration: 1.5s

.textBlock
    position: absolute
    top: 1%
    text-align: center
    margin-left: 1%
    background-color: #FFF
    opacity: 1
    padding: 10px
    border-radius: 10px
    cursor: pointer
    -webkit-filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))
    filter: drop-shadow(12px 12px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7))
.textBlock:hover
    opacity: 0.4


@-webkit-keyframes fade
    from
        -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0)

    to
        -webkit-clip-path: polygon(0 0, 81% 0, 71% 100%, 0 100%)


@keyframes fade
    from
        opacity: 0

    to
        opacity: 1


/* On smaller screens, decrease text size
@media only screen and (max-width: 300px)
    .prevBut, .nextBut, .text
        font-size: 11px
</style>
